La tierra la ha alquilado junto con su padre, pero no tienen dinero para comprar los insumos y sembrar maíz. Su sueño es ver a sus hijas graduadas en la universidad.
texts.en:
Gloria, 40, is married and has three daughters.  She has made a living in agriculture since she was 14; her father taught her.  Currently she does this work with her husband.  She also has a chicken farm.

She gets up at 5 a.m. to make breakfast for her daughters, then takes them to school.  Later she feeds her chickens, then goes to the field with her husband to work.  Finally, at midday she returns home to make lunch for her daughters.

The loan she's requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy fifteen sacks of fertilizer, three gallons of herbicide, three liters of pesticide, and two bags of seed.  She has rented the land with her father, but they don't have the money to buy inputs and plant corn.

Her dream is to see her daughters graduate from the university.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, pesticide, and seed

loans.name: Banco Mujer Fuentes De Vida Group

texts.es:
Doña Lucia es una señora de 68 años, casada y actualmente vive sola con su esposo. Su edad no es impedimento para trabajar, ella es comerciante tiene una pequeña pulpería donde vende abarrotes, refrescos y golosinas, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo y ambos trabajan en su pequeña microempresa.  Los ingresos generados de esta actividad son el único ingreso con el que cuentan para cubrir todos los gastos familiares. Este es el segundo crédito que solicita y al anterior le permitió acondicionar el corredor de su casa para iniciar la venta de algunos productos. Para esta ocasión van a invertir en más mercadería para surtir la pulpería,  ofrecer un mejor servicios y variedad de productos. 
Junto a Doña Lucia están 3 señoras más en el grupo que van a invertir en actividades comerciales y de avicultura.
texts.en:
Doña Lucia is a 68 year old woman, married, and now only lives with her husband. Her age is not an impediment from work. She is a retailer. She has a small grocery store where she sells groceries, soda, and candy. With the help of her husband they both work in the her small micro-business. The income generated from this work is the only income they count on for cover all the family expenses. This is the second credit that she is requesting and previously it had allowed her to condition the corridor of her house to begin the sale of some products. This time they are going to invest in more merchandise to stock the grocery store, offering better services and variety of products.
Along with Doña Lucia are 3 other women in the group who will invest in commercial activities and poultry farming.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, soda, and candy.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio tiene 40 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de  la cual tiene seis hijos, él es una persona trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia. Ya son 8 años que se dedica a la elaboración de adobe y le va muy bien, él también se dedica a la agricultura donde siembra papa y maíz. Desde hace varios pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar un cernidor de tierra.

Julio nació en la comunidad de Mashuay y vive en la misma comunidad donde nació. (La comunidad de Mashuay está ubicada en el distrito del Challabamba en la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Julio, age 40, is in a common-law marriage, and they have six children.  He is a hard-working person who gets his family ahead.  He has been making adobe for eight years, and it is going very well for him.  He also grows potatoes and corn.  He has belonged to the Miraflores communal bank for several years.  He now needs the loan to buy a soil sieve.

Julio was born in the Mashuay community, and he lives in the same community where he was born.  (The Mashuay community is located in the Challabamba district in the Paucartambo province in the Cusco department, Peru).

loans.use: to buy a dirt sieve.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a married woman with two children, both of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for the family.

For the past six years, she has operated a beauty salon business, with her clients being her fellow friends and neighbors. In addition to the salon, she also operates a food stall business, selling from home, which earns her another source of livelihood. 

With the loan that she is requesting of 15,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase stock of hair braids, cosmetics and foodstuffs for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of hair braids, cosmetics and foodstuffs for resale.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío, de 33 años de edad, es una mujer amable y muy entusiasta, esta casada con Robinson quien es padre de sus 3 hijos cuyas edades son 13, 9 y 6 años respectivamente, vive temporalmente en la casa de su suegra.El trabajo de Rocío consiste en la venta productos comestibles, todos los días muy temprano abre sus puertas, limpia y ordena cada uno de los productos que ofrece a su clientela a quienes espera con mucho entusiasmo y suma cordialidad. Ofrece diversos productos de primera necesidad como arroz, pan huevos, aceites, té, café, leche, diversas verduras o productos regionales como plátano, papá, frutas entre otros. Lleva en este negocio 5 años. Además de tener su tienda de comestibles, también se dedica ocasionalmente a la venta de desayunos y almuerzos en construccions cercanas a su hogar.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2200 soles y está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero que le brindan para seguir adelante con su trabajo , a su vez se compromete a cumplir con el pago puntual de  todas sus cuotas.Con el monto solicitado comprará productos comestibles tales como arroz, azúcar, aceite, verduras, leche y otros.
texts.en:
Rocío, age 33, is a kind and very enthusiastic woman.  She is married to Robinson, and he is the father of their three children, ages 13, 9, and 6.  They are temporarily living in her mother-in-law’s house.

Rocío sells food products.  She opens her doors very early every day.  She cleans and arranges each one of the products that she offers to her clientele.  She waits upon her customers with much enthusiasm and great cordiality.  She sells basic needs products like rice, bread, eggs, cooking oil, tea, coffee, milk, diverse vegetables or regional products like bananas, potatoes, and fruits, among others.  She has been in this business for five years.  In addition to having a food store, she occasionally sells breakfasts and lunches at buildings close to her home.

She will now request 2,200 soles.  She is very happy about the financial support provided to her in order to get ahead with her work.  She pledges to make all of her payments punctually.  She will use the requested loan to buy food products like rice, sugar, cooking oil, vegetables, milk, and others.

loans.use: to buy food products like rice, sugar, cooking oil, vegetables, milk, and others.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Guillermo de 63 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años, su principal siembra es el maíz y ajonjolí, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografia para luego comercializarla en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus 4 hijos, cuando pasa la temporada agrícola el cliente se dedica a trabajar de jornal en una finca que está cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para poder comparar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando el los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en:
Guillermo, 63, has made a living in agriculture for several years.  His main crop is corn and sesame seeds.  When his harvest is ready he stores it in the silos shown in the photograph, then sells it to agencies near his home that buy and sell basic grains.

With the profits from his sales he helps with his family's expenses.  He lives in his own house with his wife and four children.  When the farming season is over he works as a day laborer on a farm near his house.

He's requesting a loan to be able to buy agricultural inputs such as soil amendments, seeds, and fertilizer to help with planting his crops.  This way he'll be able to have better profits and continue helping with the household expenses without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments, seeds, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a 41-year-old lady from Kisumu county in the western part of Kenya. She is married to Dimba who is employed and also supports the family. She has three children whose ages are 12, 10, and 4.

She sells second-hand clothes in various markets, depending on market day. She has been doing this since 2008 and makes a monthly income of 40,000 KES. She has applied for her third loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to purchase more bales of second-hand clothes for resale. She will use the anticipated profit to expand her business.

Her dream is to open another business and to support her family by providing her children with the best education.

loans.use: To purchase bales of second-hand clothes

loans.name: Zainidin

texts.ru: Зайнидину 24 года. Он женатый молодой человек, проживающий в районе Кумсангир. Он вместе с женой занимается земледелием. Также Зайнидин зарабатывает на жизнь предоставляя услуги сварщика. Сейчас Зайнидин собирается начать новый бизнес. Он выбрал сферу животноводства. Зайнидин планирует закупать, откармливать и продавать крупнорогатый скот. При дворе дома у него имеется место для содержания скота. С этой целью Зайнидин обратился в организацию за кредитом для купли и продажи крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en:
Zainidin is 24 years old. He is a young, married person, living in the Qumsangir region. He and his wife are engaged in agriculture. Zainidin also makes a living by providing welding services. 

Now Zainidin is starting a new business. He chose the field of animal husbandry. Zainidin plans to buy, fatten, and sell cattle. He has a place for cattle in the yard of his home. To this end, Zainidin turned to the organization for a loan for the purchase and sale of cattle.

loans.use: to buy and sell cattle

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is a 35-year-old lady from Kisumu. She is married to Oruko who is a businessman. They have five children who are 16, 14, 12, 9, and 5 years old. 

She has been selling second-hand clothes for the last 10 years and comfortably makes a monthly income of 50,000 KES. She has applied for her fourth loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to purchase more bales of second-hand clothes. She will use the anticipated profit to plow back into the business.

Her dreams is to become a successful business lady and to take good care of her family.

loans.use: To purchase bales of second-hand clothes

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica  a la venta y elaboración de stikers y calcomanías, tienen mucha clientela especialmente las personas que tienen vehículos, con las ventas que realiza y con la ayuda de su esposo logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta está solicitando un crédito que le permita poder comprar todos los materiales como: papel, pegamento, moldes, etc. para seguir con su trabajo y así darle una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en: The client lives with her husband and two children.  She makes and sells stickers and transfers and has a large clientele, particularly people who own vehicles.  Her earnings from her sales, along with help from her husband, enable her to cover some of the household expenses.  The client is applying for a loan to buy all the materials (paper, glue, templates, etc.) that she needs to continue her work and, as a result, provide a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy paper, glue, templates etc.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco  se dedica ahora a la cría de ganado vacuno y la siembra de productos agrícolas como ser durazno, pera, ciruelos y manzanas; los productos son comercializados en el interior de Bolivia como ser en el departamento de Santa Cruz y Cochabamba. Francisco vive con su esposa y padres en la localidad de Sapahaqui en la Provincia Loayza del departamento de La Paz. Anteriormente se dedicaba a transporte de pasajeros.

El crédito lo requiere para comprar maquinaria como ser dos motobombas para permitir tener riegos para sus productos. También comprará una ordeñadora para la extracción mecanizada de leche, esto le permitirá contar con productos saludables y maximizar el tiempo de proceso en la producción de sus productos.

El sueño de Francisco, es mecanizar el proceso de producción agrícolas de los productos con lo que trabaja.

Es la cuarta vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la segunda   vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Franciso now makes a living raising cows and growing agricultural crops such as peaches, pears, plums, and apples.  He sells the crops in the interior of Bolivia such as in the departments of Santa Cruz and Cochabamba.  Francisco lives with his wife and parents in the town of Sapahaqui in the province of Loayza in the department of La Paz.  Previously he worked in passenger transportation.

He needs the loan to buy machinery such as two pumps so he can irrigate his crops.  He'll also buy a milking machine to mechanize the milk extraction.  This will allow him to have healthy products and maximize the production time for his products.

Francisco's dream is to mechanize the agricultural production process of the products he works with.

This is the fourth time he has requested a loan from IMPRO and the second time from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy two pumps for irrigation and a milking machine

loans.name: Sunatullo

texts.ru: Сунатулло холостой молодой человек. Ему 24 года. Он живет с родителями в районе Дж.Руми. Его отец в данный момент находится на заработках в загранице. У Сунатулло среднее образование. Он занимается земледелием. Одновременно Сунатулло хочет заняться животноводческой деятельностью, а именно купле-продажей мелкого рогатого скота, так как данная деятельность приносит хорошую прибыль. У Сунатулло имеются все условия для разведения скота. Он запрашивает кредит для закупа овец с целью дальнейшего откорма и перепродажи. Прибыль с новой деятельности Сунатулло хочет откладывать на свою свадьбу.
texts.en: Sunatullo is an unmarried young person. He is 24 years old. He lives with his parents in the J.Rumy region. His father is currently working abroad. Sunatullo has a high school education. He is engaged in agriculture. At the same time, Sunatullo wants to engaged in livestock activities, namely the purchase and resale of sheep and goats, as this activity brings a good profit. Sunatullo has all the conditions for raising livestock. He is asking for a loan for the purchase of sheep for further fattening and resale. Sunatullo wants to use profit from the new venture to put on his wedding.

loans.use: to buy sheep with the goal for further fattening and resale

loans.name: Sababoumandogo I Group

texts.fr:
Les dix  membres du groupe SABABOUMANDOGO  I  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans,  3 enfants et vivent toutes dans des  familles traditionnelle à  M’PEDOUGOU, un des villages de la 3ème région administrative du Mali (SIKASSO).
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huitième prêt de campagne agricole avec l’institution et tous les prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est : pois sucré  avec  MAMOU SIAKA  1ere à gauche sur la photo position debout.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, et les frais de labours  pour entretenir : 1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.
 Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 200 000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group SABABOUMANDOGO I are married women averaging 43 years of age and three children each, all living in traditional families in M’PEDOUGOU, a village in the 3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali (SIKASSO). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their eighth planting loan with the institution. And all the previous loans were correctly repaid.

The crop grown is: sweet peas, as is the case with MAMOU SIAKA, who is the first person standing from the left in the photo. With her loan, she intends to purchase some farm inputs and to cover the cost of plowing for maintaining: 1 hectare. After the harvest, the produce is sold in the village to a customer base composed of men and women. 

She plans on making an average profit of 200,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her to repay her loan and also to help out her husband in covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to cover the cost of plowing and farm inputs

loans.name: Sababoumandogo  Ii Group

texts.fr:
Les dix  membres du groupe  SABABOUMANDOGO II sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 45 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelle à  M’PEDOUGOU, un des villages de la 3ème région administrative du Mali (SIKASSO).
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huième prêt de campagne agricole avec l’institution et tous les prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est : pois sucré  avec  SOUMBA  au milieu de la photo position debout.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, et payer  les frais de labours  pour entretenir : 1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.
 Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 210 000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group SABABOUMANDOGO II are married women averaging 45 years of age and three children each, all living in traditional families in M’PEDOUGOU, a village in the 3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali (SIKASSO). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their eighth planting loan with the institution. And all the previous loans were correctly repaid.

The crop grown is: sweet peas, as is the case with SOUMBA, who is standing in the middle in the photo. With her loan, she intends to purchase some farm inputs and to cover the cost of plowing for maintaining: 1 hectare. After the harvest, the produce is sold in the village to a customer base composed of men and women. 

She plans on making an average profit of 210,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her to repay her loan and also to help out her husband in covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to cover the cost of plowing and purchasing farm inputs

loans.name: Faizullo

texts.ru: Файзулло 32 года. Он женат и имеет одного сына. Файзулло со своей семьей проживает в районе Дж.Руми, в южной части страны. Его жена работает швеей. Сам Файзулло занимается земледелием. Сейчас он хочет заняться еще и животноводством. У него есть опыт в разведении скота. Он планирует каждый месяц закупать по 4-голов мелкого рогатого скота, откармливать в течение месяца и перепродавать. С этим намерением Файзулло просит кредит для закупа 4-х голов овец и их корма. За счет прибыли с нового бизнеса, Файзулло хочет провести торжество по случаю обрезания сына.
texts.en:
Faizullo is 32 years old. He is married and has one son. Faizullo resides with his family in the J.Rumy region, in the southern part of the country. His wife works as a seamstress. Faizullo himself is engaged in agriculture. Now, he wants to engage also in raising livestock. He has experience raising livestock. He plans to buy four goats and sheep each month, to fatten them up over a month, and to resell them. 

With this intention, Faizullo is asking for a loan for the purchase of four heads of sheep and their feed. Faizullo wants to spend profit of the new business on a celebration on the occasion of his son's circumcision.

loans.use: to buy four heads of sheep and their feed

loans.name: Ulug

texts.ru: Улуг добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 48 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Она работает в негосударственной организации уборщицей. Улуг получает маленькую зарплату, которая не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Улуг много лет мечтает отремонтировать ванную комнату, так как ее ванная имеет плохое состояние. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 долларов США для покупки кафеля и других строительных материалов для ремонта ванны. Она ждет и нуждается вашей доброте.
texts.en: Ulug is a kind and hardworking woman.  She is 48 years old, married and raising four children.  She works at a non-governmental organization as a janitor.  Ulug receives a small salary, which is not enough to provide her family with all of the necessities.  Ulug has been dreaming for many years to repair her bathroom because her bathroom is in a bad condition.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1500 US dollars to purchase tile and other construction materials to repair the bathroom.  She awaits and needs your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase tile and other construction materials to repair the bathroom

loans.name: Bessie

texts.en:
Bessie is married with five children; four of them are going to school. They reside in Nkubu in the Meru region of Eastern Kenya. She has practiced farming for six years, producing tea, maize, beans and milk.

She has requested from Juhudi Kilimo a loan of 60,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) for purchasing a chuff cutter/zero grazing unit for cutting napier grass for the dairy cows, and hence, getting an increase in milk production and increase in income. Thus, she will be able to educate her children better.

The challenges she faces are a lack of proper market for her produce, pests and diseases. In five years, she plans to start selling cereals.

loans.use: To purchase a chuff cutter/zero grazing unit.

loans.name: Gavy

texts.es:
Gavy, de 32 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de un niño de 4 meses de edad  , vive junto a su familia en la casa de su madre.Gavy se dedica a alquilar su mototaxi de segunda mano a un familiar el cual le paga diariamente por el uso del vehículo. Complementa esta labor vendiendo prendas de vestir o trabajando en la decoración de fiestas infantiles con telas y globos.Todo lo que realiza le gusta mucho y no duda en poner su mayor esfuerzo para trabajar cada día con mucho optimismo, su gran deseo ahora es comprar otro mototaxi para alquilarlo y complementar así su principal fuente de ingresos.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2000 soles y está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para seguir adelante. Por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual.
El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de llantas y algunos repuestos para refaccionar su vehículo de trabajo.
texts.en: Gavy, who is 32, is married with a 4-month-old baby.  She lives with her family in her mother's house.  She hires out her second-hand motorcycle taxi to a relative who pays her daily to use the vehicle.  She supplements this job by selling clothing or decorating children's parties with fabric and balloons.  She greatly enjoys everything she does and makes every effort to approach her daily work with great optimism.  Her great ambition now is to buy another motorcycle taxi to hire out, as a means of supplementing her main source of income.  On this occasion, she will apply for a loan of 2000 soles and is very happy to know that she will have the financial support to continue to move forward.  Furthermore, she pledges that she will repay her debt punctually.  She will use the requested amount to buy tyres and have some repairs done on her work vehicle.

loans.use: to buy tyres and maintain her vehicle.

loans.name: Tilene Centrale 2 Ps Group

texts.fr: LE BANC VILLAGEOIS A ETE CREE LE 11 MAI 2001 ET EST COMPOSE DE 38 FEMMES MEMBRES AYANT DES ACTIVITES DIVERSES ET QUASIMENT IDENTIQUES. LES QUATRE MEMBRE DU GROUPE FONT PRATIQUEMENT TOUTES LE COMMERCE. ELLES ONT TOUJOURS REMBOURSE LEURS PRETS ET A TEMPS AVEC LES INTERETS Y AFFERANT. MADAME ABDOULAYE DJIGUENE QUI EST A LA DROITE DE LA PHOTO LEVANT LA MAIN ET LA REPRESENTENTE DU GROUPE. ELLE EST MARIEE ET MERE D UN GARCON. ELLE A 60 ANS. MADAME S ACTIVE DANS LA TEITURE. ELLE VA ACHETER DES ROULEAUX DE TISSU ET DES PRODUITS POUR L ACTIVITE. ELLE A PRATIQUE CETTE ACTIVITE DEPUIS PLUS DE 10 ANS. ELLE A CONFECTIONNE UNE VITRINE CHEZ ELLE POUR L EXPOSITION DE SES PRODUITS. AVEC LE CREDIT ELLE VA ACHETER 10 ROULEAUX DE BASINS SIMPLE ET 3 ROULEAUX DE BASINS RICHE. ELLE A UNE CLIENTELE QUI LUI EST FIDELE. LES PROFITS SERVENT A ACHETER DE LA NOURRITURE ET DE PARTICIPER A LA DEPENSE QUOTIDIENNE.
texts.en:
The 'banc villageois' was created on May 11, 2001 and is composed of 38 women members having diverse businesses that are practically identical. The four members of this group all work in commerce. They have always paid back their loans on time and with the corresponding interest.

Ms. Abdoulaye Djiguene, who appears at the right in the photo with her hand raised, is the group's representative. She is a married mother of one boy. She is 60 years old. She is active in dying fabrics. She is going to purchase rolls of fabrics and dye products for her business. She has been in this business for over ten years. She has constructed a glass case to display her work at her house. 

With this loan, Ms. Abdoulaye Djiguene is going to purchase 10 rolls of 'simple' damask and 3 rolls of 'riche' damask. She has a loyal customer base. The profits will be used to purchase food and to help cover day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase rolls of fabrics and dye products

loans.name: Abdumumin

texts.ru: Абдумумин житель района Дж.Руми. Ему 35 лет. У него жена и трое детей. Он вместе с женой занимается земледелием. Одновременно Абдумумин хочет начать новый бизнес. Для этого он выбрал сферу животноводства. Климат района благоприятствует здесь и ведению сельского хозяйства и разведению скота. Абдумумин планирует закупать по 3-х голов мелкого рогатого скота, откармливать в течение одного месяца и затем продавать с наценкой на скотном рынке. С этой целью он обратисля за кредитом для закупа овец и их корма. И ждет Вашей поддержки.
texts.en:
Abdumumin is a resident of the J.Rumy region. He is 35 years old. He has a wife and three children. He and his wife are engaged in agriculture. At the same time, Abdumumin wants to start a new business. To this end, he chose the sphere of animal husbandry. The climate of the region is favorable here for running agriculture and raising livestock. Abdumumin plans to buy three head of goats and sheep for one month of fattening and then resale at a premium at the livestock market. 

To this end, he is asking for a loan to buy sheep and their feed.

loans.use: to buy sheep and their feed

loans.name: Faziljan

texts.ru: Фазилчану 55 лет. Он женат и является отцом двоих детей. Старший сын находится на заработках в загранице. У Фазилчана высшее образование. Однако последние 5 лет он занимается растениеводством. У него имеется участок земли, на котором выращивает овощи, в частности помидор, огурец и картофель. В ведении сельского хозяйства ему помогает жена. Фазилчан запрашивает кредит для закупа минерального удобрения и семян овощей. В будущем он планирут расширить свое сельское хозяйство.
texts.en: Faziljan is 55 years old, married and is a father of two children.  His oldest son is working abroad.  Faziljan is a higher education, however, he has been involved in agriculture for the last five years.  He has a plot of land, where he grows vegetables, such as tomatoes, cucumbers and potatoes.  His wife helps him with running the agricultural business.  Faziljan is requesting this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers and vegetable seeds.  In the future, he plans to expand his agricultural business.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and vegetable seeds

loans.name: Norma Arely

texts.es: Norma, tiene 42 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos y vive con ellos en una aldea del municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara.  Ella ha establecido su propio negocio de pulpería desde hace dos años, para vender productos de la canasta básica familiar como granos básicos, lácteos, verduras, embutidos, desinfectantes, pastillas, pastas, manteca, etc.  Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio vendiendo mercadería y también ha realizado actividades agrícolas para el sostenimiento familiar. Ha obtenido varios créditos en ODEF, actualmente solicita el onceavo préstamo, el cual es por 20,000 Lempiras y los invertirá en la compra de productos de la canasta básica familiar como granos básicos, verduras, lácteos, embutidos y otros. Su plan es que el negocio crezca y que sus hijos logren terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Norma, 42, is a single mother of two children she lives with in a village in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara.  She’s started her own grocery store business for the last two years in order to sell basic family staple items like basic grains, dairy products, vegetables, cured meats, disinfectants, pills, pasta, shortening, etc.  She’s always been a merchant selling merchandise and has also worked in agriculture to support her family.

She’s had several ODEF loans and is currently requesting her 11th loan for 20,000 Lempiras that she’ll use to buy basic staple items like basic grains, vegetables, dairy products, cured meats and others.  Her plan is that the business grows and that her children succeed in completing their schooling.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Edwin Edilberto

texts.es: Edwin, tiene 43 años de edad, casado, tiene tres hijos, dos niñas y un niño, vive en un Barrio del municipio de Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. Anteriormente se dedicaba solo a la albañilería, pero hace 12 años estableció su propio negocio que es la fabricación de bloques de concreto para construcción de casas, cercos y otros. Los bloques son de diferente tamaño y los vende por pedidos. El negocio lo tiene en un local alquilado y lo ha podido mantener estable por la inversión de varios préstamos. Actualmente solicita el noveno préstamo que es por 21,000 lempiras, el cual lo invertirá en los materiales como arena y cemento para fabricar  los bloques. Su idea es que su negocio sea uno de los mejores del municipio y poder mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Edwin, 43, is married and has three children: two girls and a boy.  He lives in a neighborhood in the municipality of Quimistán, Santa Bárbara.  He used to just work in construction but 12 years ago started his own business manufacturing concrete blocks to build houses, walls and others.  The blocks are of different sizes and he sells them to order.  His business is in a rented space and he’s kept it going by means of several loan he’s invested into it.

He’s currently requesting his 9th loan for 21,000 Lempiras that he’ll use to buy supplies like cement and sand to manufacture the blocks.  His idea is that the business becomes one of the best in the town and to be able to improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to make concrete blocks.

loans.name: Komiljon

texts.ru: Комилжон женатый молодой человек. Ему 25 лет. Он проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Жена Комилжона не работает, она ведет домашнее хозяйство. Сам Комилжон с 17 лет занимается растениеводством и уже 8 лет как работает в этой области. У него имеется участок орошаемой земли, на котором он выращивает овощи, в основном картофель, помидор и т.д. Комилжон запрашивает кредит для приобретения минеральных удобрений и посева овощей. В будущем Комилжон намерен расширить свою деятельность и увечилить посев овощей.
texts.en:
Komiljon is a married, young man. He is 25 years old. He resides in the town of Tursun-zoda. Komiljon's wife does not work, but she runs the household. Komiljon for 17 years has been involved in agriculture and has been working in this area for eight years. He has a plot of irrigated land on which he grows vegetables, mainly potatoes, tomatoes, and the like. 

Komiljon is requesting a loan to purchase mineral fertilizers and to sow vegetables. In the future, Komiljon intends to expand his activities and to increase his vegetable planting.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and to sow vegetables

loans.name: Mairambu

texts.ru:
Майрамбу  40 лет, имеет сына. Майрамбу в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав в 2005 году с  покупки скота. Благодаря упорному труду Майрамбу в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  4 головы крупного рогатого скота с приплодом, ежемесячный доход составляет (KGS)20 000 сом. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Майрамбу  обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки скота.  Доходы от кредита Майрамбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Mairambu is 40 years old and has a son.  To provide the primary source of income for her family, Mairambu is involved in animal husbandry, having started this business in 2005 with a purchase of livestock.  Thanks to her persistent work, today her business contains four cattle with offspring, and the monthly income amounts to 20,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Mairambu requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the micro-finance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy increase livestock headcount by purchasing livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a further increase of domestic livestock.

loans.use: to buy increase livestock headcount by purchasing livestock

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is married and has three children, two of whom attend school. She also takes care of additional family members. She has a pharmacy business, which she has been operating for a few months. She generates additional income by selling charcoal to all categories of people on a retail basis. 

She has applied for a loan of 500,000 UGX from MCDT-SACCO to buy more boxes of tablets, syringes, and syrups. Her major business challenges include transportation of boxes of drugs to her shop and thieves. She aspires to own a fully-stocked drug shop, to educate two children up to university level, and to build her own house. She resides in a rented house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water.

loans.use: To buy more boxes of tablets, syringes, and syrups.

loans.name: Yamileth Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora Yamileth habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, mujer trabajadoro y luchadora, su mayor sueño es terminar de Construir su casa para darle a su hijo un  mejor futuro, ella trabaja como domestica en una casa privada en un residencial, ella lucha dia a dia para lograr sus sueños, con este nuevo financiamiento comprara  Materiales para continuar con la construcion de su casa: Bloques, Cemento, Arena, Piedrin, Hierro etc. Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva le estan brindado.
texts.en: Yamileth lives in Ticuantepe and is a hardworking woman with a great dream of completing the building of her home in order to give her son a better future.  She works as a housekeeper in a private residence and works hard daily so that she can achieve her dreams.  She will use the money from this loan to buy building materials such as cinder blocks, cement, sand, stone, iron bars, etc. for her home.  She is grateful to AFODENIC and Kiva for this help.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Varduhi

texts.en:
Varduhi has been involved in agriculture for 10 years. She keeps livestock (2 cows, 4 bulls), cultivates tomatoes, and grows peach and apricot trees. She works hard to gather a good harvest and sell it locally. Varduhi milks cows, uses the milk in cheese production, and sells the cheese. Her agricultural business helps her to sustain her family: herself, her husband, and three children. The farming business is her family's only source of income, so Varduhi does her best to earn a high income to cover the family's costs.

She has applied to SEF International for a loan to purchase fertilizer, which is very important for successful land cultivation, and to buy forage for feeding the livestock. The loan is very important for Varduhi and her family to enlarge their farming business and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To pay for fertilizer and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.es:
Marilyn tiene 34 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de  la cual tiene dos hijos, ella es una persona trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia. Su actividad económica principal es la enseñanza pues ella es profesora de nivel inicial, ella también tiene un pequeño negocio de brindar servicio de hospedaje. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de su casa o sea va hacer pintar la casa y refaccionar los dormitorios.   

Marilyn nació en el departamento de Apurímac pero vive en la ciudad de Paucartambo. (El distrito de Paucartambo en la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Marilyn is 34 years old and is in a common-law relationship, from which she has two children. She is a hardworking person who helps her family to get ahead. Her main economic activity is teaching, as she is a primary school teacher. She also has a small business providing lodging.

She has belonged to the communal bank "Miraflores" for many years, and at this time she needs a loan for home maintenance, as she will paint the house and renovate the bedrooms.

Marilyn was born in the department of Apurimac but lives in the city of Paucartambo. (This is in the district of Paucartambo, in the province of Paucartambo in the department of Cusco, Peru.)

loans.use: to do home maintenance.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos, 46 años de edad, es un humilde campesino ,habitante de la comunidad El Escobillo en las afueras de Boaco, casado ,padre de 4 hijos.
El se dedica a sembrar maíz, frijol, desde los 15 años edad solo logro finalizar la primaria, su madre le regalo a él una lata con semillas de frijol así fue que el inicio a sembrar su propia huerta. Hoy en día tiene sus propias vaquitas aunque no sean mucha pero le ayudan a conseguir otros ingresos cuando no esta sembrando, sus actividades  agrícolas las realiza con sus hijos y con un mozo el cual le paga por mantener limpio el terreno. 
Él está solicitando el crédito para comprar abono, fertilizantes, semilla y pago de mano de obrar para sembrar frijol. El espera sacar una buena producción para llevar a vender a Managua la capital que es donde le pagan mejor precio por sus productos. Lo próximo que quiere hacer es aumentar sus animales es por eso que una vez que cancele el crédito quiere comprar una ternera.
texts.en:
Santos, age 46, is a humble farmer.  He lives in the El Escobillo community on the outskirts of Boaco.  He is married and has four children.

He has been growing corn and beans ever since he was 15 years old.  He did manage to complete elementary school, and his mother gifted him with a can of beans.  This is how he started to plant his own garden.  Now he has his own cows.  Even though there are not a lot, they help him to get other income when he is not planting.  He does his farm activities with his children and with a man whom he pays to keep his field clean.

He is requesting the loan to buy compost, fertilizers, and seeds and to pay for the labor to plant beans.  He hopes to get a good production to take to Managua, the capital, to sell.  That is where they pay the best price for his products.

The next thing that he wants to do is get more animals.  Once he has repaid the loan, he wants to buy a calf.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, and seeds and to pay for the labor to plant beans.

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
Ana, es una humilde comerciante de 47 años de edad, quien con mucha dificultad termino la primaria, pues se crio en una pobreza donde la única manera de sobrevivir era trabajar para conseguir alimentos, se dedicó a limpiar casas, trabajar como domestica pero esos ingresos no eran suficiente para darle estudios a sus hijos así que con apoyo de su esposo reunió dinero y comenzó a vender tacos ella recuerda que solo tenía un litro de aceite y 20 tortillas. Hoy en día vende tacos de pollo y carne, vende cosméticos por catálogos, es así como se gana la vida a diario y paga la escuela de su hijo menor lleva 8 años trabajando como comerciante. 
Hoy requiere el crédito para comprar leña, maíz, aceite, carne, pollo y cosméticos como cremas, perfumes, labiales ect. Pues desea ofertar cosméticos aprovechar la temporada del dia de las madres y vender sus sabrosos tacos. 
Ella quiere comprar vitrinas para exhibir sus cosméticos y mejorar su negocio convertirlo en un puesto de comida bien acondicionado donde sus clientes  se sienten a comer su deliciosos y calientitos tacos, estos partes de sus metas y sobre todo sacar a sus hijos adelante.
texts.en:
Ana is a humble vendor.  She is 47 years old and struggled to finish her primary education as she was born into poverty and the only way to survive was to work in order to put food on the table.  Ana started cleaning houses and working as a domestic but the income she made wasn't enough to provide her children with an education.  With the support of her husband, she put together some money and started selling tacos.  She recalls that, in the beginning, she only had one liter of oil and 20 tortillas.  Now she sells chicken and meat tacos, as well as selling cosmetics through catalogs.  This is how she earns a living every day and how she pays for her youngest son's education.  She has been working as a vendor for 8 years.

Ana needs this loan to buy firewood, corn, oil, meat, chicken, and cosmetics such as creams, perfumes, lipsticks, etc.  She would like to be able to have cosmetics to sell in the run up to Mothers Day as well as selling her delicious tacos.

Ana would like to buy display cases in which to display her cosmetics and she would like to improve her food business by turning it into a well-equipped eatery where her customers can sit down and eat her delicious, warm tacos.  Above all, she would like to get her children ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy firewood, corn, oil, meat, chicken and cosmetics

loans.name: Lauratu

texts.en:
Lauratu is 38 years old, married to a trader, and has four children. In 1999, Lauratu established her "gara" (locally dyed) textiles business. She began this business because she wanted to be self-employed and believed that she could earn enough income to help her husband provide a livelihood for their family. Working six days a week and 10 hours a day, Lauratu earns about 900,000 SLL a month. She makes good quality "gara" clothing and does her business by public transport twice in a month.  

Lauratu is requesting a loan for 3,000,000 SLL, which she will use to buy "brilliant" fabric and quality dye. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 300,000 SLL.

Lauratu used the proceeds of her last loan to provide a livelihood for her family and pay school fees for her children. She was not able to start the house construction because she did not make enough profit to do so. She still plans to construct a house, open a saving account, pay her way for a pilgrimage to Mecca (Holy Land), and support her children's education. Lauratu is very determined and hopes to continue working hard to pay off her loans so that she can access more loans.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and dye for her business.

loans.name: Vidal De Jesus

texts.es: Don Vidal  de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hija de 3 años de edad, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, fríjol, y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para asistir sus cultivos, sus cosechas las comercializa en los mercados de granaos básicos con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Don Vidal solicita un crédito para poder mejorar el terreno donde piensa hacer su siembra y comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener buenas cosechas y así el pueda obtener  mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Don Vidal is 40 years old and lives in his own home with his life companion and their three-year-old daughter. He grows corn and beans and has gained the necessary experience to attend to these crops. His harvested crops are sold at the dry goods markets. The income he generates from his sales are used to pay for the household expenses.

Don Vidal is requesting a loan so that he can improve the land where he plans to sow his crops. He will also buy necessary supplies such as fertilizers, herbicides, compost, and other items for obtaining a good harvest. As a result, he will achieve better returns and will be able to provide his family with better financial stability.

loans.use: to pay for improvements to his land and to buy fertilizers, herbicides, compost, and other necessary supplies.

loans.name: Manvel

texts.en:
Manvel has been involved in agriculture for 12 years. 
He is a father of three sons and lives in a small village of Ararat region. 
Manvel runs a farm which currently includes a cow, 20 chickens, 2 bulls. He owns an agricultural land where he cultivates different types of fruits and vegetables (wheat, tomato, peach, apricot, cherry, plum, nut, apple and pear). Manvel's whole family helps him with running a business. His wife milks cows and uses it in cheese production. Manvel's sons help him to gather harvest and sell it locally.
As farming business is the only source of Manvel's income, it is very important for him to expand it.
Because now there is a big demand of pork in Armenian market, Manvel would like to have pigs which he would fatten and sell. He has applied for this loan to purchase pigs, forage for feeding them and tomato seeds for cultivation. The loan is very important for Manvel to enlarge his farm, gather more income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for pigs, forage for feeding them and tomato seeds for cultivation

location.town: Nor Ughi village of Ararat region

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna is from small village of Ararat region: Azatan. She has been running a farm for 15 years. Currently she keeps 6 chickens; she also owns an orchard where apricot, and peach, plum, nut and pear trees are grown with great love and care.
Susanna works hard to gather good harvest and to sell it locally. The income from agricultural business is very important for her to sustain the family of 5: Susanna herself, her husband, daughter and two little grandchildren. The income Susanna gets from running agricultural business is very important for covering the family's basic costs. 
Susanna owns a greenhouse which is old and needs to be renovated. She would like to renovate it and cultivate more fruits and vegetables, but unfortunately she has no financial resources for that. 
So, Susanna has applied to SEF International for a loan. With the loan's help, she will pay for the renovation of the greenhouse and will purchase seeds.
The loan is very important for Susanna to enlarge her business and ensure better life for her family.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of the greenhouse and seeds for cultivation

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is from Qakhcrashen village of Ararat region, where she lives with her big family of 7: Aida herself, her husband (in the photo), three sons and two daughters-in-law. 
Aida and her husband have been involved in agriculture for 15 years. They keep an orchard where different types of trees are grown (apricot, peach, cherry, nut, apple, pear, and apple). They are very hardworking farmers and do their best to gather good income and sell it locally.  As for successful cultivation of the land fertilizer is very important, Aida would like to purchase it. Because of big daily costs of the family, it is very difficult for Aida to save money for her orchard. So she has applied to SEF international for a loan. With the loan's help Aida will purchase fertilizer and an ox. This will enable her to gather more harvest and high income.
Aida and her husband love their agricultural business and dream of having a big and profitable farm.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and  an ox

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna lives in Karnut village with her husband and two children. She breeds cattle and cultivate different types of vegetables. Anna's husband sells the gathered harvest locally and gathers income which is very important for sustaining the family. Realizing that agriculture is the only source of their income, Anna and her husband want to increase their business. Because they have no financial means for enlarging their agricultural activities, Anna has applied for this loan.
With the loan's help Anna would purchase seeds, fertilizer and will be able to cover fuel costs. The loan would eased her problems, and Anna will be able to have a successful business.

loans.use: to pay for seeds, fertilizer and to cover fuel costs

loans.name: Lusik

texts.en:
Lusik is from Maralik town of Shirak region where she lives with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and little grandchildren. Lusik and her family members are involved in agriculture. They keep 4 cows and 8 calves, cultivate wheat and grow apple and pear trees. Lusik milks cows and gets milk and other milk products, and her son sells it in the local market. This agricultural income is very important for Lusik to sustain the family's living and cover its basic costs. So she has applied for this to enlarge her business. With the loan's help Lusik will purchase a cow and forage for feeding the livestock. The loan would ease her problems and Lusik will be able to get more milk.
In order to create comfortable conditions for her family, Lusik does her best to gather good income.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Juan Benedicto

texts.es:
Juan tiene 38 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de  la cual tiene cuatro hijos, él es una persona trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia. Su actividad económica principal es la reparación de carros, él y su hermano tienen un pequeño taller donde reparar diferentes tipos de vehículos y les va muy bien. Él también en sus horas libres se dedica a la vender palos que extrae de los bosques. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar una prensa hidráulica. 

Juan nació en la comunidad de Mashuay y vive en la misma comunidad donde nació. (La comunidad de Mashuay está ubicada en el distrito del Challabamba en la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Juan’s 38-year-old and is in a common law relationship; he has four children.  He’s a hardworking person who supports his family.  His main economic activity is car repair.  He and his brother have a small auto repair shop where they repair various types of vehicles and they do very well.  In his free time he also sells tree trunks that he extracts from the forests.  He’s been a member of the “Miraflores” communal bank for several years and on this occasion he needs the loan to buy a hydraulic press.

Juan was born in the community of Mashuay and still lives in the same community where he was born.  (The community of Mashuay is located in Challabamba District in Paucartambo Province within Cusco Department, Perú.)

loans.use: to buy a hydraulic press.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto tiene 26 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de  la cual tiene dos hijos, él es una persona trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia. Su actividad económica principal es la agricultura pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, maíz, habas y cebada. También, él se dedica a la crianza de animales menores. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y abono.  

Humberto nació en la comunidad de Callacancha y vive en la misma comunidad donde nació. (La comunidad de Callacancha está ubicada en el distrito del Paucartambo en la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Humberto’s 26-year-old and is in a common law relationship; he has two children.  He’s a hardworking person who supports his family.  His main economic activity is agriculture.  He has several parcels of land where he grows potatoes, corn, lima beans and barley.  He also raises small farm animals.  He’s been a member of the “Miraflores” communal bank for several years and on this occasion he needs the loan to buy seeds and manure.

Humberto was born in the community of Callacancha and still lives in the same community where he was born.  (The community of Callacancha is located in Paucartambo District in Paucartambo Province within Cusco Department, Perú.)

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure.

loans.name: Musa

texts.en:
This is 35-year-old Musa. He is married and has two children, ages 11 and 9; both of them are in school. 

In 1992, Musa established his second-hand clothing business. He began his business because he did not have the opportunity to go to school. Since his parents are traders, when was he was much older, he decided to join them in business. He helped his parents for years, until he decided to set up his own business. Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about 800,000 SLL (Sierra Leone leones) every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL. Musa requires a loan to buy sportswear for men and T-shirts for men. 

Musa used profit from his last loan to provide a livelihood for his family and pay school fees for his children. Musa’s plan is to continue to support his children’s education and improve his business in order to make more profit to achieve his dream of educating his children.  

He is a hardworking businessman. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy sportswear and T-shirts for men.

loans.name: Flor Silvestre Group

texts.es: Este es un grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras, trabajadoras, una de ellas es Flor mujer de 33 años, casada, con tres hijas y tiene seis años de tener su negocio como es la venta de muebles, tiene un año de estar en la institución como prestataria. La cliente viaja al norte del país a comercializar sus productos, este crédito lo  invertirá en la compra de muebles como sillas abuelitas, sillones, mesas, tocadores, comedor de seis piezas, jugueteras, esquineras de madera etc. Raquel tiene 33 años de edad y su negocio es tener una pulpería en su domicilio y Blanca es una mujer de 36 años de edad y su negocio es taller de mueblería.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising and hardworking members. One of them is Flor, a 33-year-old woman who is married and has three daughters. She has been in the business of selling furniture for six years. Flor has been a borrower with ADIM for one year. She travels to the northern part of the country to sell her products. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of furniture, such as chairs, rocking chairs, couches, tables, vanities, six-piece dining sets, entertainment centers, wooden corner pieces, and other items.

Raquel is 33 years old and has a grocery business in her home. Blanca is a 36-year-old woman who has a furniture workshop as her business.

loans.use: to buy chairs, rocking chairs, couches, tables, vanities, six-piece dining sets, entertainment centers, wooden corner pieces, and other furniture items to sell.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is 46 years old and has five children. Annabelle is married and has two children who are in school.

Annabelle is in the agricultural business farming rice in the Philippines. Annabelle requested a PHP 28000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Annabelle has been farming rice for 8 years now, and has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Annabelle would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Leopoldo

texts.en:
Leopoldo works hard to support he family. Leopoldo is married and has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines.

Leopoldo requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy spare parts for motorcycle maintenance.

Leopoldo has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Leopoldo would like to save money to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for motorcycle maintenance

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is married with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Leonida is 48 years old and has one child who is in school.

Leonida has a fishing business in the Philippines. Leonida requested a PHP 28000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase addtitional fishing equipment for her business.

Leonida has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Leonida would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase addtitional fishing equipment for her business

Emilinda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, can goods, shampoo, soap, sugar, milk, etc..

Emilinda has been in this business for seven years.

In the future Emilinda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, can goods, shampoo, soap, sugar, milk, etc.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

In the future, Larni would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like soap, noodles, coffee, shampoo, etc.

Lorna has been sustaining her business activities through her past 33 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

In the future Juvy would like to save money to expand her business.

Elsie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fruits to sell

loans.name: Mily
